name: VCMusicPlayer
description: An Telegram Bot Maded By Zaute to Play Nonstop Radio/Music in Telegram Voice Chats

API_ID.description: api_id part of your Telegram API Key from my.telegram.org/apps or @UseTGzKBot

API_HASH.description: api_hash part of your Telegram API Key from my.telegram.org/apps or @UseTGzKBot

BOT_TOKEN.description: Bot token of Bot, get from @Botfather

SESSION_STRING.description: Session string, read the README to learn how to export it with Pyrogram

CHAT.description: ID of Channel or Group where the Bot plays Music. Ex: -1001173263645

LOG_GROUP.description: ID of the group to send playlist If CHAT is a Group, if channel thenleave blank. Ex: -1001173263645

ADMINS.description: ID of Users who can use Admin commands(for multiple users seperated by space)

ADMIN_ONLY.description: Pass 'Y' If you want to make /play and /dplay commands only for admins of CHAT. By default 'N' /play and /dplay is available for all.

MAXIMUM_DURATION.description: Maximum duration of song to be played using /play or /dplay

STREAM_URL.description: URL of Radio station or Youtube live video url to stream with /radio command

REPLY_MESSAGE.description: A reply message to those who message the USER account in PM. Make it blank if you do not need this feature.
REPLY_MESSAGE.value: Hello, I am a bot to play music, not havimg time to chat with you.
